metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6175 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Eval injection vulnerability in php-gettext 1.0.12 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted plural forms header.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6175` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-php-gettext - 1.0.12-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: ebarretto> Still not solution as of 2018-12-07

criterions.comment: php-gettext package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.12-1').
